definitions.description: Stores appointment information between Dynamics user and their customer

constantValues: Stores appointment information between Dynamics user and their customer

members.name: actualEnd
members.description: Actual end time of the activity.

constantValues: Actual end time of the activity.

members.name: activityId
members.description: Unique identifier of the activity.

members.name: isBilled
members.description: Information regarding whether the activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

constantValues: Information regarding whether the activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

members.name: description
members.description: Description of the activity.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when activity was last modified.

constantValues: Date and time when activity was last modified.

members.name: activityTypeCode
members.description: Type of activity.

members.name: stateCode
members.description: Status of the activity.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'RetailAppointment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
supportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: scheduledEnd
members.description: Scheduled end time of the activity.

constantValues: Scheduled end time of the activity.

members.name: scheduledDurationMinutes
members.description: Scheduled duration of the activity, specified in minutes.

constantValues: Scheduled duration of the activity, specified in minutes.

members.name: actualDurationMinutes
members.description: Actual duration of the activity in minutes.

constantValues: Actual duration of the activity in minutes.

members.name: statusCode
members.description: Reason for the status of the activity.

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'RetailAppointment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
supportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the activity.

members.name: subject
members.description: Subject associated with the activity.

members.description: Information regarding whether the activity was created from a workflow rule.

members.name: scheduledStart
members.description: Scheduled start time of the activity.

constantValues: Scheduled start time of the activity.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.description: Information regarding whether the activity is a regular activity type or event type.

constantValues: Information regarding whether the activity is a regular activity type or event type.

members.name: leftVoiceMail
members.description: Left the voice mail

members.name: community
members.description: Shows how contact about the social activity originated, such as from Twitter or Facebook. This field is read-only.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'community_display' is added to the 'RetailAppointment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'community'
supportingAttribute.name: community_display

members.name: isMapiPrivate
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: exchangeWebLink
members.description: Shows the web link of Activity of type email.

constantValues: Shows the web link of Activity of type email.

members.name: exchangeItemId
members.description: The message id of activity which is returned from Exchange Server.

constantValues: The message id of activity which is returned from Exchange Server.

members.name: deliveryPriorityCode

members.name: postponeActivityProcessingUntil
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: activityAdditionalParams
members.description: Additional information provided by the external application as JSON. For internal use only.

members.name: sortDate
members.description: Shows the date and time by which the activities are sorted.

constantValues: Shows the date and time by which the activities are sorted.

members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: plannedDate
members.description: Field representing only date when appointment is planned. ScheduledStart stores time as well, while this attribute only stores date.

constantValues: Field representing only date when appointment is planned. ScheduledStart stores time as well, while this attribute only stores date.
